root.name: Le Fetiche Maya
root.description: Story The body of your mentor famous archaeologist Edward Halifax is dicovered in the jungles of Yucatan. The cause of his death or why he went missing for three years are both unexplained. On the body of Edward Halifax was a piece of Mayan parchment mentioning the existence of a mysterious fetish, so like any good pupil you decide to continue your mentors research.

similar_games.game: Dylan Dog: Through the Looking Glass
